title: How to pronounce LOONA members names - Quora

response.answer_text: Haseul is Ha - seul (like the word “seul” in French) Vivi is Vivi or Bibi in Korean Yves is Eeve (basically like the name Eve) Jinsoul is literally Jin - soul (just like the word “soul” in English) Kim Lip is… well Kim - Lip (like the word “lip” in English) Chuu is pronounced like the sound of a train “Choo Choo” Heejin is Hee - jin… Hyunjin is pronounced almost like HyAn (between HyAn and HyOn) - jin Gowon is Go (like the verb “go” in English) - won (like the past tense “won” in English) Choerry is actually pronounced like the word “cherry” Olivia Hye is pronounced as written (O-lee-vee-a H-ye), but Korean will tend to pronounce the V as a B Yeojin is the same sound as Hyunjin’s Hyun (between YA and YO) - jin
